title: Bug: Excel file paths with spaces cause HTTP 400
description:
File paths containing spaces are not URL-encoded when building Graph API URLs.

**Reproduction:**
```sql
SELECT * FROM graph_excel_worksheets('Book 1.xlsx');
-- HTTP 400: Bad Request
```

**Root cause:**
`src/graph_excel_client.cpp:21` - `BuildDriveItemByPathUrl` concatenates the path directly without encoding:
```cpp
return GetBaseUrl() + "/me/drive/root:/" + clean_path + ":";
```

**Fix:**
URL-encode the file path (spaces â†’ %20) before inserting into URL. The HttpClient has `url_encode = false` (line 76), so encoding must be done in the URL builder.
